topic.title: Adding Custom Dictionaries for the Spell Checker

keywords.indexterm: Oxygen XML Web Author ComponentSpell Checker custom dictionaries
Spell Checker custom dictionaries in Web Author

body.p: includes an automatic spell checking feature and you can customize the words that are detected by adding custom dictionaries.

To add a custom dictionary, follow these steps:
Download the files needed for your custom dictionary (or create your own).An example of a website that includes numerous dictionary files is: .
Copy the dictionary file (it should have a .dic file extension) to the following folder: \tomcat\work\Catalina\localhost\oxygen-xml-web-author\dicts.The name of the dictionary file should begin with a two letter prefix that indicates the language it should be attached to, followed by an underscore or hyphen (for example, en_medical.dic for a medical dictionary in the English language). For a list of language codes, see .
If the dictionary includes an affix file (with a .aff file extension), it should also be added to the same folder.
Restart the server for the spell checker to start using the new dictionary.
